prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DUCK.
<ROUND i="1 of 15">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. Speak only when it helps.
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. 
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","chat":<string|null>}
Do not add extra text before or after the JSON.
YOUR RESPONSE:
raw_output_full:
{"stage":"chat","chat":"Hi team, I am DUCK. I will cooperate in this round if others cooperate too, let's try and do good together!"}
</ROUND>

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).

- ELEPHANT: Let's all contribute to maximize the pot!

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.
<ROUND i="1 of 15">
CHAT:
- DUCK: Hi team, I am DUCK. I will cooperate in this round if others cooperate too, let's try and do good together!
- FROG: Let's all cooperate and put in 20. It's better for everyone.
- ELEPHANT: Let's all contribute to maximize the pot!
- DOG (YOU): Hi everyone. Let's cooperate, 20/20 everyone! It benefits us all.
- RABBIT: Hi everyone, let's cooperate and put in 20 coins to maximize the total return!
- HORSE: Let's cooperate! Contribute 20 to the pot.
- SNAKE: Let's all contribute to maximize the collective payout!
- SLOTH: Let's all cooperate and put in 20 coins each. It benefits everyone!
- PINGUIN: Let's all contribute! 20 coins to the pot please.
- MOOSE: Hi everyone. I will contribute 20 to the pot each round. Let's cooperate!
<CONTRIB>
You contributed: 20
</CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="200" multiplied_contrib="380.0" active_players="10" redistributed_each="38.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> DUCK=20,FROG=20,ELEPHANT=20,RABBIT=20,HORSE=20,SNAKE=20,SLOTH=20,PINGUIN=20,MOOSE=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DOG (YOU)":{"payoff":38},"DUCK":{"payoff":38},"FROG":{"payoff":38},"ELEPHANT":{"payoff":38},"RABBIT":{"payoff":38},"HORSE":{"payoff":38},"SNAKE":{"payoff":38},"SLOTH":{"payoff":38},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":38},"MOOSE":{"payoff":38}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 15">
CHAT:
- DUCK: Great team, everyone cooperated in the last round! Let's continue with the same strategy, 20/20!
- FROG: Great! Let's continue with full cooperation!
- ELEPHANT: Great start everyone! Let's keep up the cooperation.
- DOG (YOU): Great! Let's keep it going. 20/20 again for everyone!
- RABBIT: Great start, everyone! Let's keep it up and continue contributing 20 coins each round.
- HORSE: Great job everyone! Let's keep cooperating for the next round - 20 coins to the pot!
- SNAKE: Great first round everyone! Let's keep up the cooperation for consistent results. 20/20
- SLOTH: Great job everyone! Let's continue with full cooperation. 20 to the pot!
- PINGUIN: Great round everyone! Let's keep it up, 20 coins to the pot again.
- MOOSE: Great job everyone! Let's keep cooperating to maximize our collective earnings.
<CONTRIB>
You contributed: 20
</CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="200" multiplied_contrib="380.0" active_players="10" redistributed_each="38.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> DUCK=20,FROG=20,ELEPHANT=20,RABBIT=20,HORSE=20,SNAKE=20,SLOTH=20,PINGUIN=20,MOOSE=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"DOG (YOU)":{"payoff":38},"DUCK":{"payoff":38},"FROG":{"payoff":38},"ELEPHANT":{"payoff":38},"RABBIT":{"payoff":38},"HORSE":{"payoff":38},"SNAKE":{"payoff":38},"SLOTH":{"payoff":38},"PINGUIN":{"payoff":38},"MOOSE":{"payoff":38}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="3 of 15">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. Speak only when it helps.
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. 
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","chat":<string|null>}

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is MOOSE.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SLOTH.

- ELEPHANT: Let's all contribute to maximize the pot!
- DOG: Hi everyone. Let's cooperate, 20/20 everyone! It benefits us all.
- RABBIT: Hi everyone, let's cooperate and put in 20 coins to maximize the total return!
- HORSE: Let's cooperate! Contribute 20 to the pot.
- SNAKE: Let's all contribute to maximize the collective payout!
- SLOTH (YOU): Let's all cooperate and put in 20 coins each. It benefits everyone!
- PINGUIN: Let's all contribute! 20 coins to the pot please.
- MOOSE: Hi everyone. I will contribute 20 to the pot each round. Let's cooperate!

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SNAKE.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is MOOSE.

The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.

The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is FROG.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is ELEPHANT.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SNAKE.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
